text:
Clearer picture of mRNA #COVID19 #vaccine #AdverseEvent profile:
-Many people experience non-serious reactions, such as sore arm, fatigue or headache, especially after the 2nd dose
- Severe allergic reactions are very rare, less than 5 per million.
Read: https://t.co/CoZo2WI2uo https://t.co/KVl2oFSLbJ
